name: Halloween Dash
description:
Halloween Dash is a 2D point-&-click game comprised of Autumn and Halloween themed minigames made for the Cozy Autumn 2022 Game Jam!

The player is preparing their home for the holiday and must complete tasks to prepare to gain points within a 1 minute timer. They must sort their candy to give to trick-or-treaters, tidy their garden of fallen Autumn leaves, and decorate their living room with spooky decorations! Once the timer is up, it is game over and the final score will be shown!
